text:
@narendramodi I'm concerned about a series of video by a lady in traditional dress(saree) with rural accent...  She is spreading thoughts against your Good Governance & Fantastic Efforts for Covid-19
   Kindly take a strict action against that lady & politics behind it. Tackle them Strictly
